message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I appreciate the offer, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I think the product is worth more than $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $130.
I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $130 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $115.  Let's see if we can make this work.
I'm willing to meet you at $115, but I'd like to get a bit closer to my target. I'm willing to go up to $125.
I appreciate you coming down to $125, but I'm still hoping we can find a price that works for both of us. I'm willing to go up to $120.  This would be my final offer.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go below $125. I'm willing to meet you at $125, but I'm not budging any further.
